English:
Hmm... The smell's not as bad now. That's a good
sign.
Chinese:
呼……味道淡下來了，
看來不用被臭死了。
Korean:
후우…냄새가 가라앉았다.
코는 안 삐뚤어진 것 같네
German:
Hm ... Jetzt riecht es nicht mehr so stark.
Das ist ein gutes Zeichen.

English:
Oh? The smell's gone. And Raremon's shrinking.
Looks like that battle worked.
Chinese:
咦？那傢伙的味道消失了？
而且身體似乎變小了……
你在剛才的戰鬥做了什麼嗎？
Korean:
어라? 저 녀석한테서 냄새가 안 나는데?
그리고 몸이 작아지고 있어……
아까 배틀 때 뭐 했어?
German:
Was? Der Geruch ist weg. Und das Raremon
schrumpft. Anscheinend hat der Kampf geholfen.

English:
Oh, I see. You only destroyed the smell data.
You're some hacker, I'll give you that!
Chinese:
原來如此，只破壞了味道的數據嗎。
真不愧是駭客啊。
Korean:
그렇군, 냄새 데이터만 파괴한 거냐.
역시 해커네
German:
Ach, verstehe. Du hast nur die Geruchsdaten
vernichtet. Du bist ja echt ein toller Hacker,
das muss ich schon sagen!

English:
I'm so glad the smell's finally gone. It was
driving me crazy!
Chinese:
味道能消失實在太好了，
那真的是太難聞了！
Korean:
냄새가 사라진 건 다행이지만
정말 그건 너무했어!
German:
Ich bin froh, dass der Gestank endlich weg ist.
Er hat mich in den Wahnsinn getrieben!

English:
If that thing was a human, it wouldn't have any
friends.
Chinese:
如果是人類的話，
這可是社會問題呢！
Korean:
이게 인간 사이였다면
소송 걸었을 수준이라고!
German:
Wenn das Ding ein Mensch wäre, hätte es keine
Freunde.

English:
It will be fine now that the smell data is gone.
It doesn't understand a word you're saying.
Chinese:
味道的數據已經被破壞，往後就沒問題了。
和沒有智能的傢伙說也沒意義啊。
Korean:
냄새 데이터를 파괴했으니까 이제 괜찮아
지성이 없는 녀석에게 말해봤자 어쩔 수 없어
German:
Alles wird gut. Die Geruchsdaten sind weg.
Es versteht nicht, was du sagst.

English: Yeah... I know, but it caused so much trouble!
Chinese:
啊……這我知道。
但是真的添了很多麻煩！
German:
Ja ... Ich weiß, aber es hat so viel Probleme
gemacht!

English: It needs to be taught a lesson.
